title: Is This a Real 'Sundown Town' Sign Photographed in 2022 ...
htmlTitle: Is This a Real 'Sundown Town' Sign Photographed in 2022 ...
snippet: May 3, 2022 ... A photograph shows a sign in a "sundown town" in 2022 that reads "Whites ... after dark" was taken from a scene in the movie "Green Book.".

metatags.og:title: The Secret History of New England's Sundown Towns - New England Historical Society
metatags.og:description: New England's sundown towns were an open secret among African-Americans and other minorities. They had to leave town by dark, or else.

snippet: Aug 31, 2018 ... By Poppy McPherson YANGON (Reuters) - The grainy black-and-white photo, printed in a new book on the Rohingya crisis authored by Myanmar's ...
htmlSnippet: Aug 31, 2018 ... By Poppy McPherson YANGON (Reuters) - The grainy black-and-white photo, printed in a new book on the Rohingya crisis authored by Myanmar's ...

metatags.og:description: "Bengalis killed local ethnics brutally", reads the caption.  The photo appears in a section of the book covering ethnic riots in Myanmar in the 1940s.  The text says the image shows Buddhists murdered by Rohingya - members of a Muslim minority the book refers to as "Bengalis" to imply they are illegal immigrants.
metatags.news_keywords: Myanmar, Myanmar, Bangladesh, Rakhine state, Bengalis, Arakan Rohingya Salvation Army, Min Aung Hlaing, Lieutenant Colonel Kyaw Kyaw Oo, Rohingya

metatags.twitter:creator: @Reuters
metatags.og:description: Director Spike Lee, whose film "BlacKkKlansman" was Oscar-nominated for best picture, said "the ref made a bad call" when the competing racial drama "Green Book" won the top prize at Sunday's Academy Awards.
